description.cont: Simple argument parsing that allows you to easily set up your program without the need for bukly and ugly loops and else if blocks.
Basic non-threaded input loop that allows for not just regular keys but all mouse input (SCROLL, MOVE, RELEASE) along with a few special keys eg Control+G.
Optimised styled box renderer that allows you to draw a box onto the screen at any point. this is bundled with the input loop code as you can easily set up input detection on boxes using it.
Takes in a file and watches its contense, if the contense changes it runs a given command.
Custom text statusbar. Made as a replacement for i3status.
Uses the tomlc library to parse a toml configuration file
Uses MPV to set a video wallpaper
